We have written a number of books and stories. We are most proud of two series of stories: The Vengers and The Defenders.
The Vengers is a series of books about three boys who take-over the job of the local space marshall who is injured in a crash landing on earth. The boys are given superior physical powers and the use of the marshall's spacecraft - including its teaching machine that prepares them for their task.

The Defenders is a series of books about a Peace Keeping Force of 12 advanced robots who help maintain peace in the known universe in the 35th century. The Defenders are aided by Dr. Drogard, a robotics scientist who is crippled and works from a floating chair; Fen, an eight legged octopus-like being from the planet Ortia who assists Dr. Drogard; and Dr. Oktoong, an easily frightened being from the planet Vritan who also works in the robotic sciences. Certain books of the series study a variety of psychological themes.
